name: CreateFixedAsset
description:
Create a fixed asset in Zoho Books.

This tool is used to create a fixed asset in the Zoho Books platform. It should be called when a user wants to register a new fixed asset in their accounting records.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the organization in Zoho Books for which the fixed asset is being created.

parameters.name: fixed_asset_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details of the fixed asset, including asset name, type, accounts involved, depreciation method, purchase cost, and more.

asset_name.description: Enter the name of the fixed asset.

fixed_asset_type_id.description: Associate the fixed asset with a fixed asset type by specifying fixed asset type id.

asset_account_id.description: Enter the account id to track the fixed asset.

expense_account_id.description: Enter the account id to track the expenses associated with the asset’s depreciation.The available account types are Expense and Other Expense

depreciation_account_id.description: Enter the account id to track the asset’s depreciation over time.

depreciation_method.description:
Enter the depreciation method for your asset.The available methods are: declining_method and straight_line.
For US and GLobal Edition: declining_method, straight_line, 200_declining_method and 150_declining_method

depreciation_frequency.description: Enter the frequency of depreciation. The available frequencies are: yearly and monthly

depreciation_percentage.description: Enter the depreciation percentage only if the entered depreciation method is a declining method. The entered percentage should be within the range of 0 to 100

total_life.description: Enter the total life of the asset (in months)

salvage_value.description: Enter the remaining amount of the asset after its useful life or the value after it’s fully depreciated

depreciation_start_date.description: Enter the depreciation start date of the asset

asset_cost.description: Enter the purchase cost of the asset

computation_type.description: Enter the computation types of assets. The available types are: prorata_basis and no_prorata

warranty_expiry_date.description: Enter the warranty expiration date of the asset

asset_purchase_date.description: Enter the Purchase date of the asset

dep_start_value.description: Enter the value from which depreciation will be calculated.

notes.description: Provide notes for the asset, if required

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the zoho-books API.
